shortdesc.ph: The image content of the thumbnail or icon. Set in .

section.note: The default image is in the ARGB format. If you need to use another format, you need to convert the image on your own.

plentry.pd: The buffer of the thumbnail or icon.
The buffer length of the thumbnail or icon, in bytes.
The actual width (px) of the thumbnail or icon.
The actual height (px) of the thumbnail or icon.
